page.title: 19CLUBS IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Paxford supports a thriving Gardening Club which meets monthly in the village hall.It holds an annual Flower Show in August. The Women's Club meets monthly and a Keep Fit Club weekly. Each member of the Paxford Thrift Club saves a weekly sum, recorded on a card by the treasurer, towards a grand payout at Christmas. At Broad Campden village hall the Women's Institute meet monthly, a Keep Fit Club weekly and in the winter a Spinning Club meets monthly. Chipping Campden French Cicle which attracts a widespread membership, also meets at Broad Campden.
